feed.title: Dawarich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.13.7
entry.content:
Added

  • GET /api/v1/points response now will include X-Total-Pages and X-Current-Page headers to make it easier to work with the endpoint
  • The Pages point now shows total number of points found for provided date range

Fixed

  • Link to Visits page in notification informing about new visit suggestion

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios and chenrik on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Convert the headers to string by @sunstep in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/250
  • Add pagination headers to the API response by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/247
  • Fix/visits notificaton url by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/246

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.13.6...0.13.7

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.14.0
entry.content:
Added

  • 17 new tile layers to choose from. Now you can select the tile layer that suits you the best. You can find the list of available tile layers in the map controls in the top right corner of the map under the layers icon.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios and chenrik on Patreon ðŸ’™

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.13.7...0.14.0

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.14.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Fixed a bug where the map was not loading due to invalid tile layer name

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios and chenrik on Patreon ðŸ’™

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.14.0...0.14.1

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.14.3
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Optimize order of the dockerfiles to leverage layer caching by @JoeyEamigh
  • Add support for alternate postgres ports and db names in docker by @JoeyEamigh
  • Creating exports directory if it doesn't exist by @tetebueno

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios and chenrik on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Bump tailwindcss-rails from 2.7.3 to 2.7.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/252
  • Bump turbo-rails from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/253
  • Bump oj from 3.16.5 to 3.16.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/254
  • Creating exports directory if it doesn't exist by @tetebueno in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/255
  • Allow alternate Postgres port and DB name in Docker (fixes #88) by @JoeyEamigh in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/257

New Contributors

  • @JoeyEamigh made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/257

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.14.1...0.14.3

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.14.4
entry.content:
Fixed

  • GPX export now has time and elevation elements for each point

Changed

  • GET /api/v1/points will no longer return raw_data attribute for each point as it's a bit too much

Added

  • "Slim" version of GET /api/v1/points: pass optional param ?slim=true to it and it will return only latitude, longitude and timestamp

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios and chenrik on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Bump tailwindcss-rails from 2.7.4 to 2.7.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/272
  • Bump turbo-rails from 2.0.7 to 2.0.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/275
  • Bump rubocop-rails from 2.26.0 to 2.26.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/274
  • Bump dotenv-rails from 3.1.2 to 3.1.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/273
  • Fix GPX export timestamps and add slim version of points by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/277

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.14.3...0.14.4
